keyword: calories in arbys roast beef sandwich
title: Calories in Arby's Roast Beef Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in Arby's roast beef sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for the classic fast-food item.
h1: Calories in Arby's Roast Beef Sandwich
assumptions: Classic Roast Beef sandwich from Arby's menu; includes roast beef, sesame seed bun, red ranch sauce; standard portion (~190 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion size, and recipe changes. Check Arby's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Arby's Classic Roast Beef sandwich has about 360 kcal and 23 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Upgrade to deluxe with lettuce, tomato, onion

faqs.q: How many calories in Arby's roast beef sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 360 kcal for the classic version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Arby's roast beef sandwich?
faqs.a: About 23 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Arby's roast beef sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, around 41 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Arby's roast beef sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 810 mg, mostly from the sauce and beef.

faqs.q: Does Arby's roast beef sandwich have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 0.5 g per sandwich from the bun and sauce.
